name: Mindset (The NFT) - QueenEarth (feat. Black Chakra)
description:
During the pandemic, I was able to have folks over to play instruments, but Black Chakra was the first to come over with social distancing and emcee-ing. He helped me learn the producer/engineer role. I thank him for letting me wear this hat.

I used it to fan these flames.
lyrics
QueenEarth

It hurts to be misunderstood
When you’re tryna see yourself
The reflection aint’t no good
And you’re lost in the crowd
Wish you could
Break the glass and get out
But the ceiling’s
covered in your dreams
And you’re afraid to shatter
Never considered
A plan
That was bigger than any you’d imagine
For yourself or your path
Wide lines
Skyways
Highways
Silencing yourself
From being verbose
Listening to so called friends
Who assess your thoughts as grandiose
And you’re walking in a vision
Just as long as your were in prison
But on this side of freedom
You’re walking in the light and better days
Bout to catch a flight
Quicker than the drive
you thought you’d have to take
If you want to grow
Go this way
credits
from Queer Core: Behind the Music, released November 27, 2020
All instruments by QueenEarth
Bass by QueenEarth
Written and performed by QueenEarth
Featuring Black Chakra
Mixed and recorded by QueenEarth in Baltimore, MD
Composed by M Smith
Samples from Mixcraft
Executive Produced by QueenEarth
Mix and Mastered by QueenEarth
